title.rendered: Exposure visit conducted for STeP centers

content.rendered: Exposure Visits were conducted in centers of Delhi, Chennai, Kolkata and Bengaluru. A total of 20 exposure visits were held. The programme aims to provide an exposure to the students with learning opportunities on latest trends and practices at the workplace. The students were taken to places like MacDonald’s, Star Bazaar, Reliance Trendz and Westside to get firsthand experience of the functioning of the places.
